snippet: Mike D’Antoni, whose Lakers have lost three straight, returns to Madison Square Garden on Thursday to face his former team, the Knicks, for a nationally televised game.
abstract: Howard Beck On Pro Basketball column notes that Los Angeles Lakers coach Mike D'Antoni, who has lost three straight games, will return to New York to face his former team, the New York Knicks.
lead_paragraph: Mike D’Antoni, whose Lakers have lost three straight, returns to Madison Square Garden on Thursday to face his former team, the Knicks, for a nationally televised game.

headline.seo: Mike D’Antoni Still Struggling to Find the Right Fit
headline.main: D’Antoni Still Struggling to Find the Right Fit
headline.print_headline: D’Antoni Still Struggling To Find the Right Fit
